reviews.review_text:
One of few family air conditioned restaurants working on a Monday evening at Dona Paula side.
The interiors is classy. Service was prompt, servers were earnest & the vibe was cool. There's parking for atleast 8 cars outside.
We had vegetarian Chinese. The Menu is limited for Indo Chinese section. We ordered Gobi Manchurian which they said Gobi was out of stock. The Honey crusted potatoes were hot & flavorful, as was the egg fried rice & Mushroom Chilly.
Overall pleasant experience.

ocamotimgoa is a traditional Goan restaurant in Dona Paula specialised in Goan cuisine and seafood as well as serves other cuisines like tandoori, chinese, mughlai and North Indian.
The fish thali here is highly recommended which comes with large king fish fry, fish curry, tisreo, kismoor, solkadhi and other items. In seafood their stuffed crabs and racheado mackerel is a must try!! My favourite has to be their Chicken Cafreal which has authentic taste 10/10.
They also offer a bar serving your favourite cocktails mocktails and drinks!!

Here's what we tried üçΩÔ∏è
Kingfish thali 345/-
Stuffed crabs APS
Prawns rava fry 375/-
Racheado mackerel 315/-
Chicken Cafreal 315/-
Chicken biryani 355/-
Caramel pudding 145/-

The ambience is well designed, classic and spacious. Perfect for birthdays, parties and get togethers!! A definitely must visit place near Panjim!!

Finally had a chance to visit this goan food place.!
We were warmly welcomed by the owner himself ..!
The food was too good
Very tasty
Each dish we ordered was better then the previous one .!
Quantity seem very good considering we were three of us ..
priced quite well and not very expensive.
Possibly one of the few restaurants who have managed to cook squids on a perfect note .
Fish served was super fresh . The recheado masala however seem to be a bit overpowering but was tasty .
Prawn curry was nice in taste but a little spicy .
Overall a great experience with some real good food ..! Hoping to visit back soon  ..!
